argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: .T. = Indicates that the Time_String can be interpreted as a valid short time. .F. = Time_String can not be interpreted as a valid short time.

argument.name: Source
argument.description: A character representation of a short time value.

page.description: Returns true is the string value is a valid short time.
page.discussion: The IsShortTime() function returns .T. if the Time_String is a valid representation of a short time value. Note : A Short Time value does not include a date component.
